title: [Minecraft.net | MINECRAFT BUILDS]优雅内饰
author: 封徵
txt_content:
本帖最后由 封徵 于 2020-5-16 20:43 编辑 

MINECRAFT BUILDS
Elegant Interiors
优雅内饰

Created by Adventus Prime
作者：Adventus Prime

Nova Barlow 诺瓦·巴洛


Showing off a number of design elements,Adventus Prime not only raises the roof to let us peek inside but also raises the bar for all of us looking to give our home a spring refresh. With colorful plants, coordinated seating, hanging chandeliers, and patterned walls, the effect is fun and inspiring. Thanks for letting us take a look at your stunning house!
如此数量众多精心设计的元素表明，Adventus Prime 不仅仅是抬高了建筑的房梁让我们能更完整的窥见其中玄奥，更让“家”这座建筑所代表的含义有了更高的一层面的诠释 —— 予家以春日之息。缤纷艳丽的植物，相协的座椅，悬挂的枝形吊灯还有精心布置的墙面，这一切共构出一幅欢乐而又祥和的画面，令人精神抖擞。感谢作者为我们展示的如此令人印象深刻的房屋。

Now it’s your turn! What have you been building lately? Tell us all about it by sending some screenshots and information to FeatureMe@minecraft.net, and you might just see your creation featured here on Minecraft.net!

现在，该轮到你了！你最近的建筑成果又是什么呢？不如发邮件到 FeatureMe@minecraft.net 并附上你的建筑的几张截图和简短的介绍，或许不日你就能在 Minecraft.net 看到我们对你的建筑的推荐了！




【封徵 译自官网 2020 年 05 月 07 日发布的 Elegant Interiors；原作者 Nova Barlow】
【本文排版借助了：SPX】

replies.txt_content:
